titleStmt.title: An epistle vnto the right honorable and christian prince, the Duke of Somerset written vnto him in Latin, awhile after hys deliueraunce out of trouble, by the famous clearke Doctour Peter Martyr, and translated into Englyshe by Thomas Norton.
Epistle unto the right honorable and christian prince, the Duke of Somerset.
titleStmt.author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By N. Hill] for Gualter Lynne, dwellynge on Somers Kaye, by Byllinges gate],
publicationStmt.date: Anno a verbo incarnato. M.D.L. Regni Edwardi sexti. iii. [1550]

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC. Imprint from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
